Title: Prosecutors with Celestial Hammers
Legend: Prosecutors are winged heralds who soar above the battlefield upon wings of starlight. Wielding enchanted hammers that are summoned directly from the tempest, they rain down a constant barrage of death upon the foe.

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Battleline in a Tempest Lords army

Intro: Each model in a Prosecutors with Celestial Hammers unit is armed with 1 of the following weapon options: Pair of Celestial Hammers; or Celestial Hammer and Sigmarite Shield. All models in the unit must be armed with the same weapon option. 1 in every 3 models can replace their weapon option with a Grandweapon.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Hammerstrike Force • Vanguard Wing

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Prosecutor-Prime. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Celestial Hammer or Pair of Celestial Hammers.

Rules.Name: Dispersed Formation
Rules.Fluff: Prosecutors are trained to fight in a widely dispersed formation.
Rules.Rule: If this unit has 2 to 5 models, it is coherent if each model in the unit is within 3" horizontally of at least 1 other model in the unit instead of 1". If this unit has more than 5 models, it is coherent if each model in the unit is within 3" horizontally of at least 2 other models in the unit instead of 1".

Rules.Name: Heralds Of Righteousness
Rules.Fluff: Prosecutors cross the battlefield in a blur of light.
Rules.Rule: Heralds of Righteousness: You can attempt a charge with this unit if it is within 18" of an enemy unit instead of 12". Roll 3D6 instead of 2D6 when making a charge roll for this unit.

Rules.Name: Sigmarite Shields
Rules.Fluff: Stormcast Eternals can use their sigmarite shields to create an impregnable shieldwall.
Rules.Rule: Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target this unit if at least half of the models in this unit (rounding down) are armed with Sigmarite Shields.
